name: Central Nut Adjustable Wrenches
description: Ergonomically designed thermoplastic elastomer handle distributes pressure uniformly in the hand, reducing the risk for work related injuries.

name: Side Cutting Pliers
description: Distance from joint to centre of cutting edges is reduced for greater leverage and increased cutting capacity.

name: Square Drive Cordless Brushless
description: High efficiency, more power, low maintenance, longer lifespan,  1/2 inch square drive with retaining ring.

name: Electronic Torque and Angle Wrench
description: Torque range covers from 7 to 800 N·m and from 5.1 to 590 ft.lb.Programmable automatic shut-off time.

name: Long Flat Nose Pliers
description: Two-component ERGO™ handles: soft thermoplastic surface on tough polypropylene base provides superior grip.

name: Superior Handsaws for Timber
description: Ergonomic and well balanced product, designed to fit perfectly in the hand with superior handling and comfort when sawing.
